name: arxiv_query
description: The arXiv API allows programmatic access to the hundreds of thousands of e-prints hosted on arXiv.org.

search_query.description: It is a string that represents a search query used to find articles.

id_list.description: It contains a comma-delimited list of arXiv id's.

start.description: This defines the index of the first returned result, using 0-based indexing.

max_results.description: This determines the maximum number of entries returned in the feed. The default is 10.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
